::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock tries to read the quordinates but has a confused look on his face.
   
  Grimlock: What numbers mean?
   
  Grimlock knows enough to press the "help" button on the controls which locks in an automated landing sequence that follows the quordinates.
   
  Finally after sometime the shuttle touches down. The shuttle hatch opens and Grimlock steps out in his T-Rex mode.
   
  Grimlock: Me, Grimlock, here. Where Motherload?

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          For a second, the tech was baffled.

Tech: Jotunn sent him to speak with Motherload? What the slag is he
talking about? Hmph.... Probably one of those bigshot case anyways...
[He turns on the comm again.] Transport, this is Olympus Complex.
Follow the flight coordinates I'm sending. I hope you enjoy your stay.
[He closes the comm.] I hope it's a short stay... Who'd like to have
Grimlock around for long anyhow?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Grimlock::
> 
> Grimlock recieved the message from Olympus. It took him a moment
to respond as he had to figure out how to work the comm system.
> 
> Grimlock: Me Grimlock, Dinobot. Me with Lord Jotunn and Dragon
Corps. He tell Grimlock to go Olympus and find Motherload. Me have
message for Motherload.
> 
> Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
> As the shuttle came near to the base, a tech called it.
> 
> Tech: Maximal shuttle, you are appraoching Olympus. You have 1 cycle
> to state your ID and your intents before we shoot you down.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > ::Grimlock::
> > 
> > The workers at the shuttle port attempted to stop Grimlock from
> taking a shuttle. They wanted written approval from Lord Perseus. Big
> mistake. They wer not seriously harmed but they all now know not to
> get in the way of a Dinobot.
> > 
> > The bay doors are blasted apart as Grimlock pilots the shuttle
> away from Atlantis. Grimlock directs the shuttle towards Olympus where
> he will carry out the orders of Jotunn: Find Motherload and tell her
> we need Stormblaze.
> > 
> > ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::
> > 
> > The Hevn puppet watches as the shuttle blasts it's way out of the
> bay and heads into the sky. Through the puppet Jhiaxus is wondering
> how things are run in this city. He knows that he must stay low-ki and
> wait for the chance to snatch Nightlight.
> > 
> > 
> > ---------------------------------
> > Looking for last minute shopping deals? Find them fast with Yahoo!
> Search.
> >
> 
> 
> 
> 
>

Try it now.
>
